title: @ Riot KateyKhaos
body: In about a year and a half I'll be getting that 2k win mark! I'll be better this time I promise :P. I can't say this enough but thanks for playing my 1k win with me :). Hope all is well!

replies.body:
Heyo! 

No worries at all! Be sure to hit me up when you get to 2k, I'd be happy to join you again!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=W3Fp5tjj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-26T22:39:06.757+0000)
>
> Heyo!

> No worries at all! Be sure to hit me up when you get to 2k, I'd be happy to join you again!

Lmaooo That's gonna be a while :P If you ever want to play prior, just let me know :o
